title: Fengriffen: A Chilling Tale
description: Pervading Evil... Unholy Darkness...Bewildered and terrified, a young bride finds herself powerless to resist the grotesque horror of an inhuman revenge... and within the accursed walls of Fengriffen Manor, a cycle of torment, lust and nightmarish dread draws even nearer its hideous climax...
author: David   Case
